snippet.title: Sailing Era - Official Steam and Epic Games Store Trailer
snippet.description:
Every voyage is a journey of "Sailing & Beyond" in Sailing Era! 

Sailing Era, a hyper-realistic sailing and trade adventure in a massive open world, developed by GY Games and published by Bilibili, is now available globally on PC on January 12, 2023. 

Navigate your fleet and sail for fun; run a business; have a romantic encounter in the tavern; capture pirates amid intense battle; explore inland for treasure... Experience foreign culture, make novel discoveries, and sail away!


Purchase Links:
Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2161440/Sailing_Era/?utm_source=IGN
Epic Games Store:  https://store.epicgames.com/p/sailingera-450a80


Official Account:
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/GSailingera
